alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:46AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CRAIGHEAD AND NORTHERN POINSETT COUNTIES THROUGH 815 AM CST... At 745 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weiner, or 7 miles northwest of Harrisburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Harrisburg, Lake City, Bay, Weiner, Greenfield, Hergett, Apt, Hatchie Coon, Gum Point, Lester, Maple Grove, Promised Land, Cary, Lache Lake, Needham, Bunney, Lunsford, and Davis Spur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
